title: Learning-Oriented Leadership Competency Enhancement in Hybrid Work Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational Leadership Fundamentals, Basic Workplace Understanding, and Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Course Designed for Practitioners to Intensively Acquire and Apply Leadership Strategies for Learning Facilitation in Hybrid Work Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three methods for designing reflective learning activities in hybrid work environments
Participants can apply an integrated knowledge-sharing framework (digital/physical spaces) to practical cases
Learners can propose at least two strategies to strengthen team capabilities through discussion-based leadership practices
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
